SEARCH
Package com.mycompany.lab1.model

Class TeamDatabase

java.lang.Object
com.mycompany.lab1.model.TeamDatabase
public class TeamDatabase extends Object
TeamDatabase stores unique team names and validates incoming names. It throws InvalidTeamNameException for invalid names. All fields are private; accessor returns an immutable copy. Validation rules (example): - name must not be empty after trimming - name must contain only letters, digits, spaces, hyphens or underscores - length between 1 and 50 characters
Version:
1.0
Author:
trela
